title: Gadget Gizmo (E-commerce project)
bullets: Designed and developed RESTful APIs for a microservices-based Java backend using Spring Boot, integrated with MongoDB and GCP Cloud Storage to support e-commerce operations.
Implemented secure authentication using Spring Security and JWT tokens.
Ensured code quality with Test-Driven Development (TDD) using JUnit and Mockito.
Automated CI/CD using Jenkins to deploy containers on GKE.
